name: create_file
description: Creates a new file, optionally inside a specific folder on the desktop.

filename.description: The name of the file to create. e.g., 'my notes.txt'

folder.description: Optional. The folder on the desktop where the file should be created.

name: get_temperature
description: Finds the current temperature for a specified city.

name: get_time
description: Finds the current time in a specific city.

city.description: The city for which to find the time. e.g., 'London'
